title: Stadia Changelog: Overcooked will launch on May 5, FIFA 22 is just $15 for a limited time
content:
Google Stadia has a few games on its horizon, but one title that was supposed to arrive in April, Overcooked, has been delayed.

moreâ€¦

The post Stadia Changelog: Overcooked will launch on May 5, FIFA 22 is just $15 for a limited time appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The hit game Overcooked has confirmed a slight delay on Google Stadia, which will see the game released during the first week of May.
